paragraphs.body: Kuai ball is a ${link_0} ${link_1} usually played on the beach and is popular with vacationers on ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: Kuai ball is a Fire Nation sport usually played on the beach and is popular with vacationers on Ember Island.

paragraphs.body: During their stay on Ember Island, ${link_0} noticed several teenagers playing a game of kuai ball. She immediately commanded ${link_1}, ${link_2}, and ${link_3} to gather around, demanding they play next. Azula used her tactical insight to devise a game plan that involved using the weakness of one of their opponents, an old injury, against her. Utilizing their acrobatic skills, they managed to quickly defeat the opposing team, destroying the playing field and net in the process.
paragraphs.text: During their stay on Ember Island, Azula noticed several teenagers playing a game of kuai ball. She immediately commanded Ty Lee, Zuko, and Mai to gather around, demanding they play next. Azula used her tactical insight to devise a game plan that involved using the weakness of one of their opponents, an old injury, against her. Utilizing their acrobatic skills, they managed to quickly defeat the opposing team, destroying the playing field and net in the process.

paragraphs.body: The court for a kuai ball game consists of a circular playing area divided by a net. The object of the game is to hurl the ball over the net using one's hands or feet, with points being scored by having the ball hit the ground on the opposing team's side of the net. The game ends when one team reaches ten points.
paragraphs.text: The court for a kuai ball game consists of a circular playing area divided by a net. The object of the game is to hurl the ball over the net using one's hands or feet, with points being scored by having the ball hit the ground on the opposing team's side of the net. The game ends when one team reaches ten points.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} and acrobats have an advantage, as the game requires moving the legs and the rest of the body quickly, in a similar fashion to firebending.
paragraphs.text: Firebenders and acrobats have an advantage, as the game requires moving the legs and the rest of the body quickly, in a similar fashion to firebending.

paragraphs.body: Kuai ball is similar to sepak takraw, a Southeast Asian sport comparable in concept to volleyball but played without the use of hands.
paragraphs.text: Kuai ball is similar to sepak takraw, a Southeast Asian sport comparable in concept to volleyball but played without the use of hands.
